name: Witch'scape
description:
This game was made during a 4 days Game Jam at our school, the HEAJ (Haute Ecole Albert Jacquard) of Namur.

In this game, you will embody Soul, a little witch would just past away. Using your knowledge of magics and plants, you will have too escape from hell, collecting all the fragments of the broken gold coin to pay the guardian to cross the Styx and be reborn.

Our game actually only contain one level where you will only have one power, but we did think about some other features but didn't have time to add it.
This game was made by students in only 4 days. We know it's not perfect and still hold some minor bugs.

_____________________________________________________________________

THE TEAM :

Camille Paquin - Game Art :  Camille Paquin (artstation.com)

Juliette Dupont - Game Art :  Juliette Dupont (artstation.com)

Tristan Baverez - Game Art :  Tristan Baverez (artstation.com)

Sylvain Vandermeer - Tech Art : Sylvain Vandermeer (artstation.com)

Tutiaux Margot  - Game Anim : Ripsa (artstation.com)

Peter Lecog  - Game Anim : Peter Lecoq (artstation.com)

_____________________________________________________________________

The option menu doesn't exist.

The menus only work with a mouse.

The game can be played with a gamepad.

Use the arrows/joystick to move around and A to use your power.
